abstract: The three major technology companies have traditionally competed for digital advertising revenue, but they will now sell ads for one another.
snippet: The three major technology companies have traditionally competed for digital advertising revenue, but they will now sell ads for one another.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo, AOL and Microsoft, three major technology companies that have traditionally competed for digital advertising revenue, have created an unusual partnership in which they will sell ads for one another.

headline.main: AOL, Yahoo and Microsoft Reportedly in Ad Deal
headline.print_headline: AOL, Yahoo And Microsoft Reportedly In Ad Deal
